resources.string: Internet is currently connected. To disable or change your internet connection, please unlock the phone and go to Settings and modify Internet Settings
Internet is currently not active, Please go to Unlock phone and go to Settings and connect to internet. Internet Connection is needed to start Patrolla
Bluetooth is currently connected. To disable or change your bluetooth connection, please unlock the phone and go to Settings and modify Bluetooth Settings
Bluetooth is currently not active, Please go to Unlock phone and go to Settings and connect to bluetooth. Bluetooth is needed in order to connect printer to Patrolla
Location Service is currently enabled. To disable or change your location service settings, please unlock the phone and go to Settings and modify Location Settings
Location is currently not active, Please go to Unlock phone and go to Settings and enable location service. Location Service is needed in order to start Patrolla
